sentences.english: This paper presents a new method for breakdown location on power cable insulation.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種電力電纜絕緣擊穿點定位的新方法。

sentences.english: The drummer beat the soldiers to arms.
I guess I don't have to call you, now that I ran into you!
sentences.chinese: 既然我們萍水相逢了，我想就沒必要擊電話給你了。

sentences.english: To strike out with the foot or feet.
The hole I strikes the rifle is the sniper special-purpose breaks far to the high accuracy rifle.
sentences.chinese: 孔I擊步槍是狙擊手專用的遠斷離高精度步槍。

sentences.english: It is the one major power which impinges directly on India's geopolitical space.
sentences.chinese: 這是對印度地理空間上的其中一個重大沖擊。

sentences.english: Smash the glass and press the button in emergency.
sentences.chinese: 遇到緊急情況時，擊碎玻璃並摁下按鈕。

sentences.english: Smash the glass and press the button if any exigences happen.
sentences.chinese: 遇到緊急情況時，擊碎玻璃並摁下按鈕。

sentences.english: Hong Ying empty broken 7906, white eye Sanmeng air strike bell.
sentences.chinese: 洪英半空碎拋盤，白三矇眼空中擊鈴鐺。

sentences.english: The Hurl Boulder and Ram effects no longer share a cooldown.
sentences.chinese: 炮彈投擲和蒸汽錘擊不再共享冷卻時間。

sentences.english: There is a return stroke after the lightning hits the ground.
sentences.chinese: 在閃電擊向地面以後出現了一次回擊。

sentences.english: The new-tax law made a tremendous impact on small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 新稅法律造成對小企業的巨大沖擊。

sentences.english: Our export fruit knives are packed in boxes of 100 dozen each.
sentences.chinese: 咱們用於沒心的生果刀每箱100擊。

sentences.english: On one hand, hypostatic economy gets very big impact.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，實體經濟受到很大沖擊。

sentences.english: Earth Shock now also reduces ranged attack speed.
sentences.chinese: 大地震擊現在也降低遠成攻擊速度。

sentences.english: She suddenly hit the thief on the head with a hammer , and he went out for the count.
sentences.chinese: 她突然用錘子擊向小偷的頭部，小偷暈了過去。
